website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive trail shoe with a good design that works equally well when you're moving uphill or downhill.
pros: Sturdy rubber sole on the shoe gives protection on the trail from debris
Includes a gel layer in the sole of the shoe that provides comfort
cons: Sole doesn't have as much padding as some more expensive options

customer_reviews.title: WARNING: Bad Soles.Tread Comes Off Quickly & Easily!!!
customer_reviews.text: After two months of periodic wear, the tread on the soles of these shoes are falling off and can no longer be worn. I have owned many pairs of Asics over the years and abused them hard and long and they never fell apart like these Scrams did after only a few months of light use. I cannot recommend these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Big Dawg

customer_reviews.title: Okay.... If you don't mind being a novice shoe repairman.
customer_reviews.text: The grip and tread life so far have been great. They are very comfortable and feel great even after a sloppy run. My biggest gripe is the crap adhesive Asics used on the bottom tread to attach the traction pads to the sole. Thankfully I work where I can get industrial strength epoxy to repair the now over 75% of the tread pads that have come undone. I used Loctite Tak Pak and haven't had a single pad come loose since. I would imagine a good crazy/super glue would work also.
customer_reviews.author: Rick S.

customer_reviews.title: My son really loved the style and the comfort and the right fit ...
customer_reviews.text: My son really loved the style and the comfort and the right fit but in the 2nd week of wearing it part of the sole peeled off during running!! Had to return it
customer_reviews.author: Sh

customer_reviews.title: Sick looks, epic comfort; noisy like cleats on hard surfaces
customer_reviews.text: ASICS for life. Super comfortable for a short, 230 lb dude like me. I’ve had knee surgery in the past, so my knees are junk these days. I couldn’t get by with anything less than ASICS anymore. I have zero pain in my knees, back or feet with this brand. One star removed: the grips on these sound like cleats when walking on a hard surface like a department store or in the tiled office at work. Kind of embarrassing walking around sounding like you’re stepping on bubble wrap. These were definitely designed for the backwoods trails (and they are in fact marketed as such, so I shouldn’t complain)
customer_reviews.author: DJ XybepteK

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, fit great, have held up for me. 2nd Pair.
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes for hiking, this is my second pair. I wear size 14 in ASICS, and they fit consistently. For that reason all my shoes are ASICS. I like the cushioning of this sole for rocky trails and the traction for steep, slippery slopes. I agree the tread design could be more reliable. I don't know if it's style or skimping on an expensive material, but they really shouldn't glue little bits of tread on like that, they are going to be prone to peeling off. However, I have had not had that problem personally, so 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Paul from Santa Rosa

customer_reviews.title: As expected and will repurchase.
customer_reviews.text: I've put on about 150 miles and am pleased--about 50% of the miles were on solid surface, the remainder rocks, grass and dirt. Good traction and stability. The laces also stay tightened...a nice touch without having to do a double know. I do wish this model had reflective features. When I'm running on paved surfaces I use the ASICS-2000 series. The fit was as expected and the toe box fit well, likely a little larger than other models, but it worked well for me. I'll be ordering another pair soon.
customer_reviews.author: J. Childs

customer_reviews.title: ASICS Men's Gel-Scram 3 Trail Runner Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased ASICS Men's Gel-Scram 3 Trail Runner for my son and he loves them. They arrived within 4 days with prime shipping. The package arrived in a brand new shoe box with all the brand new labels. He tried them on and they fit as expected since we had ASICS before. We used these for trail running and they did awesome. The souls after 3 runs dont even look like they have been on rocky mountains. The colors are vibrant and even better when the kid thinks they look cool. I would recommend these one on amazon since we need them other places on line for a much higher price.
customer_reviews.author: Effrin

customer_reviews.title: great..!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes..nice feeling and cushion,i always get my running or gym shoes half size larger or one size larger,cause i want my foot to have these extra space and be comfy..Asics is the best brand out there,cannot switch to another..been with me for so many years..!!!
customer_reviews.author: Antony

customer_reviews.title: these shoes are just as perfect as any ASICS shoe
customer_reviews.text: one month review and let me tell you, these shoes are just as perfect as any ASICS shoe. I'm a RN, Surgical Tech, Fitness, and Tactical person and these shoes fit for any purpose. Easy to clean, comfy, sleek, washable, durable. Anything you're looking for in a daily wear these shoes have. everything is great quality and even after a month of heavy duty use, no signs of wear and tear. The laces held up, no holes in the cloth, and they work for every facet of my life. Buy these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Bubba Rokita

customer_reviews.title: So I want to say thank you for selling such a good product for a reasonable price and I have no ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes to walk trails and hike. I took them with me to Colorado and did some real hiking on some real mountains. And everybody around they kept slipping and sliding in Falling Down, but these shoes help their grip on any kind of surface wet or dry or Sandy. So I want to say thank you for selling such a good product for a reasonable price and I have no scratches and I didn't fall not once. Take care have a great day loyal customer Jim
customer_reviews.author: Appleluver

customer_reviews.title: Good for running around in daily
customer_reviews.text: Only shoes my wife who works in the ER doing X-Ray will wear. Update: the soles have worn down faster than normal and when I walk on wet pavement, water gets inside and makes a weird squishing noise. Still fairly comfortable but not as durable as some other ASICS I’ve had. However, it may be due to the fact that I have used these outside more than my work shoes and I did a lot of outdoor projects last summer and fall. Still, a year is a pretty good lifetime for active shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Shopper

customer_reviews.title: but so far I really like them. I always order Asics and always the ...
customer_reviews.text: Only been using these shoes for the past month, but so far I really like them. I always order Asics and always the same size. When ordering on line I believe that once you get it right don't mess with it. This style does seem to offer better traction on soft ground than other shoes I have worn. I will be giving them a great workout in a couple weeks when I run a race on the beach at Nags Head, NC.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Grant

customer_reviews.title: I Buy A New Pair Every Year
customer_reviews.text: Yes I have bought a new pair of these shoes every year for the past four years. I originally bought them for running on trails and then I started wearing them all the time. The shoes are durable and comfortable. I get a half-size larger than my regular shoe size when purchasing running shoes. I am very pleased with this product and I will by a new pair next year!
customer_reviews.author: J. Hanlon

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Build Quality. Expected better from Asics
customer_reviews.text: I initially really enjoyed these shoes. However, after only wearing them a few times, the tread began to peel away from the soul of the shoe, presenting a tripping hazard. Since I am just barely past the return window for these I now have to decide whether I want to try to glue the loose pieces down, or just tear them off. I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Great trail running/walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: Simply great. Not your daily running shoes. Better used for trail running. Thick shock-absorbing sole makes them perfect for going on trails with rocks and ruts. Anti-skidding sole design with very good grip on both rocky and loose terrain. I would buy another pair but I can only find the orange or green ones, not the full grey that I have
customer_reviews.author: JoelBS

customer_reviews.title: Back Pain Gobe
customer_reviews.text: My preteen son loves Asics. I love good prices and great quality. My son was complaining of back pain and I started to worry it was more than growing pains. We decided to buy him a new pair of Asics since he had been wearing his current pair for 9 months. That was it! His back pain stopped immediately. Completely gone. He loves the colors and the tread design. Great shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy C

customer_reviews.title: Best light trail running shoe I've found yet
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe for light duty hiking, great stability and comfort although expect to shred them in tough conditions (e.g., lava). Unfortunately Asics changes models about every 5 minutes so this review will already be outdated by the time its posted. If someone could combine the durability of merrell with the comfort and stability of asics that would be the best shoe ever.
customer_reviews.author: jawbox

customer_reviews.title: husband loved them and wanted more so i bought a second pair in different color !
customer_reviews.text: ordered for my husband he loved the first pair i bought. he said they were super comfy for some who is constantly on his feet. they are really durable he wore the heck of them for a solid year and the only reason i replaced is because they looked super dirty. i ordered a second pair in a different color and he loved them just as much .... will be ordering a third pair hear soon!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney blinn

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shoes for two months
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are comfortable and fit as advertised. Love the color and fit. Only complaint I have is longevity of the exterior. tread started to come unglued after a month and after two months the nylon threading holding the shoe started to come loose. Still wearing them but they look ragged now.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Presnell

customer_reviews.title: God’s Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Al falls from the second floor of his house, hitting his head, and then has an out-of-body experience in this episode. Appearing at the Heavenly Gates, then sees God's Shoes, which he said were brown and gold, had socks stitched in, and the toes were custom fitted. These are ... Gods shoes! I have 3 pairs if that says anything
customer_reviews.author: Lane Kollen

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I typically wear size 12 for shoes, but size 11.5 fits perfect when it comes to ASCIS. This here is my first ASICS pair of running shoes, and they are great. Will definitely re-buy once I need a new pair. The bottom of the shoes are designed for trail running, but I use them to run anywhere; concrete, grass, track. I do believe this makes them better than flat bottom running shoes, makes me feel safer when I'm running, specially in the rain, which is something that I like to do.
customer_reviews.author: JV

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my husband. I have worn Asics for years, FINNALY, got him to try a pair, he loves them!! He works standing/walking on cement floors 8-10 hours a day, no more complaints about foot fatigue !! We made a believer out of him. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Lorna Eary

customer_reviews.title: Try bigger size
customer_reviews.text: Honestly a great sneaker, I needed to return hoping for a larger size. I do usually wear 12.5 but these are closer to just 12. Sometimes you just need that bit more room but I truly feel bad I missed out on this one.
customer_reviews.author: shawn cicero

customer_reviews.title: Best ASICS trail shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is a great all around shoe, trail running or hiking, and beach shoe. The aggressive tread is ideal for a variety of terrain. Fit is as expected and the quality of the materials is good. For the money, this is one of the best ASICS trail shoes; I've had almost half a dozen pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Olson

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are awesome in so many ways
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are awesome in so many ways. Gotta love the color and camo combination, and the tread is great for a solid grip. I broke these in for a couple weeks and than ran a half marathon with these. No problems with any part of the shoe. One of my all time favorites, I've officially dropped Nike.
customer_reviews.author: 13fknox

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes. First pair of ASICS I've had. I've had them for a few weeks wearing them on the weekend and have not had any of the rubber separation that other reviews mention. So far so good. I'll definitely buy more of this style ASICS..
customer_reviews.author: Rusty

customer_reviews.title: Great light hiker with short life span
customer_reviews.text: Work for me, over and over again. I've knocked off a star because these just don't last very long. Going through my purchase history they are good for about 3 months. I hike about 50 miles a week, and they're done at the 3 month mark. They are comfortable but I'm on the lookout for something better.
customer_reviews.author: ESM

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, but they fall apart fast
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes, but the soles fell apart within 6 months. That said, I'll probably buy them again--they were certaintly used a lot. Hiked a lot in them and wore them all summer.
customer_reviews.author: Wisco

customer_reviews.title: Quality construction, feel great on the feets!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these shoes... an avid runner (not for sport, just in general) he says these feel great, don't rub anywhere (like some of his previous sneakers) and he loves the colors. Now if his feet would just stop growing out of every pair every few months... ha ha ha.
customer_reviews.author: MotoBella

customer_reviews.title: Well done asics!
customer_reviews.text: As an avid hiker I am very impressed with these shoes. Just put about 13 miles through Bryce canyonand they were great! Light, comfortable, solid feeling, and the traction is very aggressive so minimal slip. I was worried because I usually wear boots while hiking but I loved these for a day hike.
customer_reviews.author: Tvigil

customer_reviews.title: A really fine ul trail, bike, city, most anything, runner.
customer_reviews.text: I have worn these out. I've put a few hundred miles on them hiking, biking, and just living. They got soaked with sweat mud and all kinds of gross stuff. They were really kind to my feet till they just couldn't take it any longer. ... I need/want a new pair.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel R Low

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes for outdoor use.
customer_reviews.text: Asic's sizes have always been the same for me so far as well as being comfortable. These have very good grip which is exactly what I was wanting. Only downside is that in 2 months one of the shoes already has a squishy / sqeeky sound when stepping, not a big deal though.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Great all around shoe!!!!  buying another pair....
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes first pair of asics I have had, that i can recall, my size is 11.5 usually in wide but these fit good with the laces loose a bit. Do not fatigue youre feet. For a durable shoe you cant go wrong, saucony triumph still more comfortable but not as durable by a longshot.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great all purpose shoe trail & workout shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace a pair of worn out New Balances. Been more than 20 yrs since I wore Asics and decided to try them out. Fantastic fit, lightweight and very comfortable for my narrow/flat feet. Soles are a good all purpose design - want to use them as a walking / light workout tennis shoe. So far they are exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: I like the look, bought the green trim ones. Fit as I expected they would and are good looking. I use them for the gym (weight lifting) 5 Days a week but have had a couple of runs in them also.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but tread started to fall off after a couple months
customer_reviews.text: Shoe fits as expected, but after a couple months of every day wear the glue that held the treads on started to loosen and the treads started to fall off. Also very squeaky on floors.
customer_reviews.author: A.J.

customer_reviews.title: Have been some of my favorite sneakers.
customer_reviews.text: Will probably need to buy again since I've worn my current pair for over a year (I know you are supposed to replace your daily wear sneakers every 6 months to a year, but they are Asics so they last.)
customer_reviews.author: Murdoch Savage

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Okay only had for 2 weeks but very comfortable, so have bought another pair. Only concern is others have had pieces of sole fall off. If this occurs will downgrade rating.
customer_reviews.author: BARTYTIM

customer_reviews.title: and this pair did not disappoint me. The shoes offer great support and excellent ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my eighth pair of ASICS over the past six years, and this pair did not disappoint me. The shoes offer great support and excellent traction while weighing about the same as regular running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: Good value, great tread.
customer_reviews.text: The outside colors are wearing/rubbing off but the tread is awesome and the toe box is a bit larger than the gel-kahana I usually wear. Did I mention the tread is really good? Especially for downhill trail runs. I would buy these again. Very good value.
customer_reviews.author: Bypod

customer_reviews.title: These shoes were great! However
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were great! However, my husband wore them for only 3 days and the rubber sole on the heal came off. Will be returning them.
customer_reviews.author: TayLund

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful training shoes
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful shoes! Much better in real life than in pictures. The colors and materials are great. Very well finished. Great shock absorption, specially in the heel region.
customer_reviews.author: R. Quiros

customer_reviews.title: Great sneaker
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing ASICS for a number of years now. My last pair has lasted almost two years with no rips or tears. The cushioning is no longer what it used to be but that is expected with sneakers. I am hoping to get the same out of this pair. They are very comfortable and feel like I am walking on air.
customer_reviews.author: James J Vail

customer_reviews.title: durable
customer_reviews.text: ran the tough mudder with these. My feet and arches were great the next day.
customer_reviews.author: J.M.

customer_reviews.title: Buy these -
customer_reviews.text: Turned into one of my favorite pairs of shoes - great for hiking, and I wear daily to work. I've been wearing them for about 4 months - zero complaints. Nice support, nice fit, and they aren't wearing down as I feared they would. I'm size 11 and have been for years. These fit just as they should.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Ray

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable trail shoe ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoes. Suck breaking in but the most comfortable trail shoe I’ve worn.
customer_reviews.author: rudy4570

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, sturdy shoes
customer_reviews.text: I'm a handyman and am on my feet all day. These shoes feel great and hold up to a lot of abuse. Once the work day is over, they are really comfortable as I transition into my alter-ego and coach soccer, great for running in, good traction, decent venting. I love the laces, thick and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: BOGIE ROSYPAL

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, I wear them at work all day every day, I do food service delivery and for me these last about 3 months before I wear them out. I walk about 3-5 miles a day and these things are just comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: brent

customer_reviews.title: ASICS- Top Notch & Comfortable Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love the ASICS Men's Gel-Scram 3 trail shoes! The line of ASICS shoes are some of the most comfortable shoes I have ever wore & last a lot longer then other brands I have bought in the past! Also like that the shoes has a gel like liner inside! Great shoes overall!
customer_reviews.author: WilliamTop Contributor: Country Music

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Durability for actual hiking, started falling apart after less than 5 good hikes... are comfy and cool enough looking
customer_reviews.text: **maybe these are just fine for pavement running/smoother trails, but I used exclusively for hiking and they aren't durable at all. I beat up all hiking shoes, but these ones went way quicker than newbalances or all other ones i've had in the past. The bottom grip part started peeling after very few hikes. They are pretty comfy, good looking shoes, the terrible durability is my only complaint
customer_reviews.author: flyamazo

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart in weeks
customer_reviews.text: The tread of this shoe started delaminating and falling off after about 4 weeks of wear. The picture shows the shoes after 8 weeks of wear. More and more tread pieces keep falling off. I have contacted the company that we bought them from and we are asking for a refund or a new pair of shoes (not these shoes). We have had great success with ASICS in the past, these just have a manufacturing or design issue.
customer_reviews.author: outdoor

customer_reviews.title: Great Running Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great, comfortable running shoe - love the design and fit - great to run in. I’ve been paying close attention to the treads because of other reviews mentioning they come off easy - but 40km in and no problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B

customer_reviews.title: Comfrotable, affordable, and still in great shape
customer_reviews.text: I'm a Nike man, but I gave these a try for camping and hiking. They are very comfortable and are still in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: Kate H.

customer_reviews.title: I haven't worn these shoes two weeks and some of ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't worn these shoes two weeks and some of the glue has come off the bottom of the shoe and is falling off. JUNK SHOES!!
customer_reviews.author: Jumper

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I still wear them, even after my dog chewed them up a little. My favorites shoes, good cushioning, and they have really held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Rick B

customer_reviews.title: Love Asics. These are just a touch small with ...
customer_reviews.text: Love Asics. These are just a touch small with normal sport socks on. I own other version of this brand and have no issue.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: very light with good support all around
customer_reviews.text: I got the shoes last week to start running once again. The shoes fit well on my feet, very light with good support all around. They smooth out the road impact well and the treads are grippy on dirt. A solid shoe to run in. Have not walked with these shoes yet, but that's not why I got them.
customer_reviews.author: marco

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable for the price
customer_reviews.text: I go through a pair of trail shoes every two-three months. I’m extremely hard on shoes and put a lot of miles on them. I usually wear New Balance or Nikes. For ~half the price of my usual shoes these have held up much better and I think the traction on loose surfaces is better. Highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Michael T

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe for big feet.
customer_reviews.text: My husband has size 12.5/13 feet that are hard to fit effectively. ASICS have never disappointed us. My husband bought these shoes based off of the gray camo shoe and green multicolored sole.
customer_reviews.author: Colette

customer_reviews.title: they are as comfortable as a workout sneaker can be & they can ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd pair of Trailrunners, plus I also have 3prs of anothe style of ASICS RUNNING SHOE, they are as comfortable as a workout sneaker can be & they can take a beating!!️
customer_reviews.author: Michael Russo

customer_reviews.title: Beats most shoes that are twice the price
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of ASICS, My first pair are still fine 2 years old and are my main shoes for work and play. Very comfortable and light. Beats most shoes at twice the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dirty Dogs

customer_reviews.title: These are a great shoe, pretty durable and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are a great shoe, pretty durable and comfortable. Use this ASICS style cause they allow for me to use my SuperFeet insoles
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Hord

customer_reviews.title: Comfy durable.
customer_reviews.text: Pro Painter I use these at work and they stand up to abuse. Also really good traction and ventilation rarely do I get stink foot. Very comfortable to be in all day. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Conaway

customer_reviews.title: These shoes were great at first
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were great at first. He said they were comfortable and had great support. But the rubber on the bottom peeled off both shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amy J.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the fit, finish, and performance. Regular walker using these every day for several miles, doing great!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Mostly happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe. A little tight on top of foot, but after flexing shoe back & forth it has gotten better. My only complaint is the soles are LOUD if you happen to drag your feet on most surfaces. High pitched chirp that may scare the s**t out of someone, or yourself. Great traction though...ha.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Beebe

customer_reviews.title: Son loves these shoes they fit him fine. He wears his all day about 8 hours ...
customer_reviews.text: Son loves these shoes they fit him fine. He wears his all day about 8 hours and does not complain , now the shoes are almost year and halve old and they need to be replaced. this is about normal for us as he is in sports activity He still loves the type of shoe and wants me to buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: rcmiller

customer_reviews.title: excellent shoes, lightweight and cushion is great
customer_reviews.text: excellent shoes,lightweight and cushion is great. there is a nice amount of support in arch These shoes work great for treadmill and on trail due to lug pattern. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: E. Brandeau

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!! All Amazon Sellers Should Be Like This!!!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived earlier than expected and item was packed nicely. Sneakers are brand new and fit perfectly. Excellent purchase, excellent price...couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: RichandLisa

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: They fit great but I only gave them four stars because they started to come apart already in two spots. They should last for a year or so but I expected a little better
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Order half size larger than you regularly get.
customer_reviews.text: I did order them a little larger because I've bought Asics shoes before and they seem to be sized a bit smaller for me, so I go up a half size.
customer_reviews.author: Roger L. Meneely

customer_reviews.title: Tread Falls Off
customer_reviews.text: Our family has owned a lot of Asics and have always been pleased. This is the first pair that we've had a problem with. The tread started falling off after a few short weeks of wear. After two months of normal wear the tread is sloughing so bad it's a trip hazard. The side wall foam also began disintegrating shortly after arrival. Very disappointed in this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Fawn L.

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable shoe I’ve owned. I stick with these. These are my 3rd pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They fit great and I like them
customer_reviews.text: These are a little stiff, but probably becasue they are more of a hiking shoe rather than a running shoe. They fit great and I like them.
customer_reviews.author: bruce1365

customer_reviews.title: Pain Inducing / Unmet expectations
customer_reviews.text: The Aspics gel trail shoe has been my go-to shoe for the last 5 years for an annual ultra hike/run (>26 miles). Not sure if they changed the design this year but my feet hurt terribly the day after my training runs.
customer_reviews.author: John Luchansky

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my husband for Christmas and he loves them! He can't stop talking about the support the shoes gives his ankles and feet. We only buy asics in this house and we try almost every type. He told me these are the best yet I have bought him.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Renée

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. Quickly becoming one of my preferred brand of
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Quickly becoming one of my preferred brand of shoes
customer_reviews.author: Jon Nations

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Great Foot bed& Platform.Great shoe to walk in& go out on the night in the towne in! Great value for Your$!
customer_reviews.author: craig snowberger

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe all around
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable sneakers I've ever worn! It's like walking on air. I did change the shoelaces however that was for my own personal preference, the laces they came with were fine. I am 100% positive when I need new sneakers again I am going with the Asics brand
customer_reviews.author: Laina Foust

customer_reviews.title: Better than much more expensive shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I buy a pair of these every couple months after trying many other far more expensive shoes. I run very steep, rocky, sandy, gravel trails and the tread is thick and sturdy enough but not heavy or bulky. Highly recommend these shoes
customer_reviews.author: Ross Tabor

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, not durable.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are comfortable. I bought them because they looked like they'd have good grip on ice for the winter. And they do. But the treads started to fall off after 1 month of regular city walking
customer_reviews.author: Akcam

customer_reviews.title: Worth the discounted price.
customer_reviews.text: Not as much cushion as previous models from Asics, but good traction on dirt surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Dutch Boy

customer_reviews.title: Great sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Love these sneakers. Feel great for every day wear. Have good support for anyone suffering from Planter Fasciitis.
customer_reviews.author: Ra

customer_reviews.title: I use these as work shoes and change them out ...
customer_reviews.text: I use these as work shoes and change them out every 3 months or so. I rehab houses and beat the heck out of them. (Idon't wear boot cause i can't bend over to unlace by the time i get home at night because i abused my body too much) I can only find on line now.
customer_reviews.author: B. Wolff

customer_reviews.title: Happy Kid
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these, and wants his next pair to be the same!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: One of the best trail shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great trail outdoor shoes! True to size. Definitely recommend to anyone who bikes, runs, hikes, walks outside. The grip is incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Jurga

customer_reviews.title: Good grip and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Been working construction in these for 3 months just starting to show a little wear. Good grip and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony D.

customer_reviews.title: Wear these everyday
customer_reviews.text: These are workhorse shoes..... I wear these in a warehouse environment and they have performed exceptionally well with minimum wear issues in the sole or uppers after months of wear.... comfy and stylish too!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie covington

customer_reviews.title: Good value for Asics Trail shoe
customer_reviews.text: Good trail walking shoe. Last built a little different than most Asics' shoes.
customer_reviews.author: wetdawg

customer_reviews.title: I like wearing bigger shoes so i always go 1/2 size ...
customer_reviews.text: I like wearing bigger shoes so i always go 1/2 size bigger, i just like the room more for some reason. This is another asics so i knew it would fit like my old ones and it does, so if you own any asics just get the same size. Yet again they are very well made and i hope to use them until they wear down.
customer_reviews.author: Carter

customer_reviews.title: Asics are the most comfortable shoe for me
customer_reviews.text: Asics are the most comfortable shoe for me. The size was a little small but eventually conformed to my foot and now I hate taking them off.
customer_reviews.author: claire morales

customer_reviews.title: I have bought 3 pairs each lasting at least a ...
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 3 pairs each lasting at least a year warn as main shoe and workout shoe as well.
customer_reviews.author: Simple dad

customer_reviews.title: This shoe is for "dirty tracks" and I do not recommend for street running
customer_reviews.text: I think I made a mistake. This shoe is for "dirty tracks" and I do not recommend for street running. The sole got destroyed after some runnings. For an Asics shoe, I was expecting more. Anyway, it's my fault. Regarding the seller, it's ok. No important issues.
customer_reviews.author: Gianfranco

customer_reviews.title: All around good price and product.
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes and good fit. Arrived ahead of time. One of the few brands I find in size 14.
customer_reviews.author: Edward D.

customer_reviews.title: but it's not bad enough to spend the time exchanging them
customer_reviews.text: The inner sole has a strange indent on the right shoe where the toes are. Not much of an issue, it just took some getting used to when your feet don't sit in the shoes the same way. If the indent were any bigger or caused some pain I'd send them back, but it's not bad enough to spend the time exchanging them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, quality shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great price excellent shoes if you under pronate/supinate (run on outside of foot). These are my second pair and they last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Mihalyi

customer_reviews.title: Love me some ASICS
customer_reviews.text: Really comfy shoes. Perfect fit. I did have to return the first pair that was sent to me as there was a spot of glue on 1 shoe, but the return couldn't have been easier and the replacement was sent immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin F

customer_reviews.title: Asics and their consistency
customer_reviews.text: Although the shipment of these shoes was delayed by 3days from the original promised delivery date (likely due to Christmas volume) they arrived and met with my typical Asics "expectations" of consistent fit (across the entire Asics shoe line) as well as quality. Asics is the only shoe brand I have confidence in purchasing online.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellent price.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several over the years. always fits, excellent price.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Tuley

customer_reviews.title: These shoes have held up well for at least a ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have held up well for at least a year under every day work use and heavy trail use. I have noticed that the outside sole does wear out with time faster than the treading on the shoe, for those with an inversion running stance.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic Gonzales

product_meta.title: ASICS Men's Gel-scram 3 Trail Runner
product_meta.description:
Our trail ready gel-scram 3 shoe combines active wear with adventure style. This shoe features our impact-specific gel cushioning system for an incredibly comfortable ride.

In 1949, Mr. Kihachiro Onitsuka began his athletic footwear company (Onitsuka Co., Ltd.) by manufacturing basketball shoes out of his living room in Kobe, Japan. He chose the name ASICS for his company in 1977, based on a famous Latin phrase "Anima Sana In Corpore Sano," which, when translated, expresses the ancient ideal of "A Sound Mind in a Sound Body." Taking the acronym of this phrase, ASICS was founded on the belief that the best way to create a healthy and happy lifestyle is to promote total health and fitness. Today, ASICS offers a full line of performance-driven athletic shoes and technical active sports apparel and accessories dedicated to bringing harmony to the body and soul.
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately low-top from arch
Rearfoot GEL Cushioning System: Attenuates shock during impact phase and allows for a smooth transition to midstance.
Trail Specific Outsole: Reversed lugs provide uphill and downhill traction on all types of terrain.
Removable Sockliner: A sockliner which can be removed to accommodate a medical orthotic.
